message.name: ERR_APPEALSTAGE_XRV_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: Cannot modify or cancel this Appeal Stage because it has already been cancelled.
Cannot modify or cancel this Appeal Stage because it has already been canceled.

message.name: ERR_APPEALSTAGE_XRV_PROCESS_CANCELLED
message.locale: Cannot create, modify or cancel this Appeal Stage because this Product Appeal Process is cancelled.
Cannot create, modify or cancel this Appeal Stage because this Product Appeal Process is canceled.

message.name: ERR_APPEALSTAGE_XRV_PAST_STARTDATE
message.locale: Cannot create, modify or cancel this Appeal Stage because the start date of this Product Appeal Process is earlier than today.
